content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Corporate Credit Card Policy (CITI)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1. Purpose\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To establish an objective governing standard for EPAM Systems Inc. (EPAM, Company) and all of its subsidiaries as it relates to Corporate Credit Card (Card) usage.  This Corporate Credit Card Policy (Policy) relies on and complements\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMTRVBT/Global+Travel\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Global Travel and Expense Policy\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", Corporate Credit Card Agreement, local policies, and provides Card usage instructions.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The policy may be amended at any time and EPAM may depart from it, depending on the circumstances.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2. Scope, Adherence and Responsibilities\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This Policy applies to all EPAM employees, regardless of length of service, worldwide, without exception. Strict adherence to this Policy is a condition of employment with EPAM worldwide.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compliance with the Policy will allow employees to utilize the Card to incur business expenses. Compliance with the Policy will allow the Company to safeguard its assets, maintain appropriate accounting records, timely invoice customers, and fulfill its contractual obligations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees are expected to be conservative in their spending, and approvers are expected to be diligent in their review, and verification of all expenses charged from the Card. An employee incurring business expense is expected to exercise the same care as a prudent individual making expenditures for personal reasons.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The CTC Group, Corporate Finance, and Internal Audit departments may also monitor policy compliance and perform audits on Card expenses. If card spending is identified to be unreasonable, not in line with Card intent, or expenses incurred on the card are not reported timely with appropriate support, the result can be Card suspension and/or cancellation and other enforcement methods outlined in Section 10 of this Policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Debit Cards are out of scope of this Policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3. Validation and Safekeeping\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card must be signed immediately upon receipt by the Cardholder (“Ask for ID” signature is permitted). The Card is non-transferrable valuable property of the Company, which requires proper treatment by the Cardholder to protect it from misuse by unauthorized parties. The Card should always be treated with the same care as personal credit cards, bankcards, cash and checks. When using the Card for internet purchases, Cardholders should ensure that the site utilizes industry recognized encryption transmission tools. Card must be returned to the Cardholder after each charge and it should be verified that the returned Card has proper name on the Card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Cardholder is considered to be responsible for safe keeping and all usage incurred on the card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"4. Applying for a Corporate Credit Card (CITI Card)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Standard Travel & Entertainment (T&E) Citi card is primarily intended for travel and entertainment purposes. The Card is restricted to certain types of expenses/merchants: air tickets, train tickets, hotel, transportation, car rental, gas, meals. Those charges will be available at most locations. The card will be declined if it is charged for something non-travel related or from closed category.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Only Company employees are permitted to have Corporate credit card. Company subcontractors are not allowed to have the Card. If an employee reasonably estimates that job duty fulfillment will require expense incurrence they should:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Discuss the situation with their supervisor/Resource Manager (RM)/Account Manager;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Seek and obtain their supervisor`s approval in writing or email form;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Submit a written request with supervisor`s approval to the Support Team (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:support@epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"support@epam.com/\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Support Portal Catalog\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://support.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"https://support.epam.com/\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"), providing filled in requisition form, which contains the following items:\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Title (Mr/Mrs/Miss/Ms/Other)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Potential cardholder`s name (passport name)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"E-mail address of the cardholder\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card delivery business/office address including postal/zip code (personal address can be used for employees working off-site)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Dates when delivery address is valid\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Credit limit amount if it exceeds default EPAM Citi card credit limit amount (approximately $5K in equivalent of your card program currency)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Supervisor`s/RM`s written approval, where Citi card necessity and Citi card credit limit amount are confirmed (even if the request is created by Travel Department)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Justification and explanation for Citi Visa need (purpose)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card expected usage amount and frequency\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Without providing all listed data, Citi Card request will be rejected by Support Team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a requisition form meets all listed requirements Support Team assigns the request to WFA Credit Card Management. Other information which is necessary for credit card ordering may be requested from an employee depending on his location.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Card request will be reviewed and confirmed by Credit Card Management team, the request may be rejected and rejection reasons will be clearly stated.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As soon all information is provided, link to the portal where Card Agreement and Card Policy must be acknowledged via electronic signature will be sent to the cardholder by WFA Credit Card Management together with card activation and usage instructions. Corporate Credit Card will be ordered after Card Agreement and Card Policy are acknowledged only.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At no time a user may be allowed to hold more than one Corporate Card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"5. Lost, stolen, or damaged Card\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Damaged, Lost or stolen cards must be immediately reported to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACreditCardManagement@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACreditCardManagement@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"AND to the Bank's 24-hour toll-free numbers\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"on the back of the card.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The card will be cancelled and replacement will be ordered and shipped within a few days. It is the cardholder`s responsibility to identify such situations timely.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"6. Expired Card\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Expiration month indicates the last month when the Card is valid (for example, 03/19 means the card is active until 31-Mar-19). Renewal Cards are issued when the existing Card approaches the expiration date listed on the Card, as the Card will not be usable beyond that expiration date. Citibank will mail a new Card to each Cardholder or to EPAM office (it depends on employee's location) approximately 30 days prior to the beginning of the expiration month of their existing card. Cardholder will be notified when the replacement Card is issued. Cardholder will be asked to provide valid delivery address for the replacement Card. Once the replacement card is received, it will need to be activated.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7. Corporate Credit Card Usage\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate Credit Card (Card) is provided to assist employees in effective fulfillment of their duties.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Violation of any aspect of this Policy may result in the suspension and/or cancellation of the Card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Citi card is Chip and PIN card, the instructions how to set the PIN will be sent to the Cardholder as soon as the Card is ordered.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Card has a monthly revolving limit. The limit on the card can be changed by request, but require approval by the Cardholder`s Supervisor (Resource Manager), the Financial Management Authorities. Both the estimated limit and the estimated duration for how long the limit needs to be increased for will be required. The limit can also be lowered or set to 0 if non-compliance or suspicious activity is identified.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" If the charge was expected to go through but it was declined, the bank can be contacted for immediate support (phone number on the back of the card) and asked for a reason of decline. Declines can also be viewed by the Cardholder in CitiManager: Statements – Recent – View Authorizations. Decline case can be reported to WFA Credit Card Management.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If cardholder has changed surname or name (for example, in case of marriage), he should notify WFA Credit Card Management to receive a new plastic for the Card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Card will be cancelled upon termination of employment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.1  General guidelines related to the Card usage\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate Credit Card is a privilege that can be revoked anytime by the authority granted to the Corporate Finance Department if usage not in line with Card intent is identified Card privilege may be also revoked due to misuse or non-compliance with reporting standard\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card is mainly intended for business travel expense\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While not general intent of the Card, certain authorized employees (for example members of Procurement or BSS department) may utilize cards for non-travel purchase\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The allowable expenses are listed in Global Travel and Expense Policy (Local Travel Policy).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Cards may be provided to EPAM employees only ( the cards cannot be issued to subcontractors or non-employees).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.2  Cases, when the Card cannot be used and may be suspended\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The list is not intended to identify all possible situations and is meant to be used as an example.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"ordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card usage for any personal expenses is prohibited If such personal expense is identified, but not reported properly the card will be deactivated and Card privilege will be removed Violator can be also subject to further penalties from the Company up to and including dismissal and criminal prosecution (further outlined in section 10 of this Policy).\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees are not permitted to utilize the card for expenditures not permitted by Global Travel and Expense and Local Travel Police\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No ATM Cash withdrawals or Cash Advances from the Corporate Credit Card are permitted without exception\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No charges on behalf of others (unless it is a group meal) are allowed In case of a group meal, the most senior employee in attendance must be responsible for paying the bill; If card is utilized (for example by the Travel Group member) for others, the charge must be reassigned in Concur to the correct party immediately\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card is not intended for any IT-related procurement, all equipment expenses should be initiated by BSS Department\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card may not be used for any subscriptions (licenses, software and et), as such expenses should be confirmed and made by corresponding BSS Department or other Department-Specific permission shall be requested by members of appropriate departments to be allowed to use the Card for such expense typ\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Any employee with unreported overdue Card charges will have their Card deactivated, until all delinquent reports are complete Corporate Card privilege may be suspended indefinitely\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate Card is not meant to replace regular Account Payable process AP process should be utilized wherever possible\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Cardholder is responsible to maintain all support for each transaction Credit Card Management team will monitor card activity for frequency and amount If Card is not used regularly it may be suspended in order to avoid fraudulent activity.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Occasionally, Card may be declined at certain vendors for a number of reasons outside Company`s control It is prudent to have some backup means of payment – cash, personal credit or debit card, traveler's checks and etc.\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"7.3  CITI Corporate Credit Cards as Procurement Cards\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As mentioned previously, the intent of the Card is to assist employees with their travel expenses. However, the Company realizes that the Card is a convenient method of payment for goods and services. Thus certain functions and departments may utilize the Card as a procurement card.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Card should be used for procurement purposes only by certain positions (Procurement Specialists, IT Specialists, Office Specialists, Training and Development Specialists, Administrative Assistants) as a method of payment for goods and services for the company's needs. Such card can't be used for travel and entertainment purposes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each such department must assign an employee who is responsible for the Card, its usage, and timely reporting.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employee can obtain only one type of the card, two types of the card can be received only in exceptional cases.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Specific requests must be made to permit users to utilize the Card for such purpose.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"8. Disputed Items\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is the Cardholder`s responsibility to follow-up on any erroneous charges, returns or adjustments to ensure proper credit is given on subsequent statements. Card expenses/transactions can be tracked in Concur (transactions appear in Concur automatically, normally with a lag of about 2-5 business days from the date of charge to the date transaction is posted into Concur).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If a transaction was not authorized/recognized by the Cardholder, WFA Credit Card Management must be notified immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"9. Card Expenses Reporting\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All Card expenses must be reported using Concur in accordance with Global Travel and Expense Policy and will not be processed through any other methods. Each cardholder is expected to learn the expense reporting module in Concur and must be proactive in obtaining help and guidance. All questions related to Card expenses reporting can be addressed to\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACostTracking@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACostTracking@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Concur Online Help is located\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://www.concurtraining.com/customers/tech_pubs/help/en-us/release/expemp_professional/index.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal expenses shall be clearly identified by the Cardholder in the expense report. They are to be deducted from reimbursement or employee's payroll.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All charges must be reported within one month of being incurred without exception.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All Card expenses must be reported prior to employee`s dismissal.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"10. Monitoring and enforcement\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CTC Group is assigned with monitoring Card usage for propriety, adequate support, and timeliness of reporting. If violations are identified, CTC Group is to inform the Financial Management Authorities immediately. Internal Audit and Corporate Finance Departments may also audit and monitor Card usage.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If Card expenses are not reported properly and timely, the employee will be notified via e-mail of the need to comply. From the date of notification, the cardholder has 2 weeks to comply. If the compliance is not achieved, the final notification will be sent. If compliance is not achieved within 1 week of second notification the card is deactivated and will not be reactivated regardless of circumstances until compliance is achieved.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once compliance is achieved (in this case it means the expense report with appropriate support is submitted), the card may be reactivated upon Cardholder's request. If the cardholder becomes in violation of reporting guidelines again, the Card will be deactivated again and Card privilege can be permanently removed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No employee can be eligible for any Company promotional consideration such as raises, bonuses, stock option grants, and etc. while non-compliant with the Card Policy.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Significant violations can result in further sanctions by the Company up to and including termination and criminal prosecution (if fraud is identified).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The final decision to block the Card due to Policy violation is granted to the Chief Financial Officer, the Financial Management Authorities.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"11. Help\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an employee encounters any difficulty or has a question that relates to Corporate Credit Card usage WFA Credit Card Management can be contacted at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACreditCardManagement@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACreditCardManagement@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If an employee encounters any difficulty or has a question that relates to Corporate Credit Card expenses reporting CTC Group can be contacted at\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFACostTracking@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFACostTracking@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
